channel.title: Adding New Hitmarks [HELP]
channel.description:
Hey, So I followed this tutorial to add new hitmarks: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,516825.0.html
I added it all correct and they come up but the problem is with the hp bar and when the hits in pvp come up twice but only do 1x damage like it will say 5 damage and it will come up twice but it will only deal 5 damage so how do I remove the other one and also in pvp and pvm when ever a block is hit 2 of the block sprites come up. Here is a picture of the problem.
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/34j7wnk.png[/img]
Help Please.
Also for HP Bar I put the right directory.
Thanks, RS PS
